name.baseName: Farmland remediation ; In-situ remediation ; Solidification/stabilization ; Construction preparation ; Equipment transportation
农田修复;原位修复;钝化修复;施工准备;设备运输

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The process described is intended for the environmental rehabilitation of farmland contaminated by lead and zinc mining activities. This remediation process utilizes in-situ solidification/stabilization techniques during the construction preparation stage, which includes the transportation of necessary equipment. It is specifically applied within a unit process aimed at treating 16 hectares of heavy metal-contaminated farmland in Nujiang, Yunnan Province, China. The primary goal is to reduce the bioavailable concentrations of Cadmium (Cd) and Lead (Pb) in the soil by more than 70%, ensuring that the concentrations of these metals in crops meet the required safety standards by 100%.
稳定化修复施工准备阶段，设备运输过程。

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: 云南省怒江州受铅锌矿污染某耕地土壤 污染修复工程

technology.technologicalApplicability: The process described is intended for the environmental rehabilitation of farmland contaminated by lead and zinc mining activities. This remediation process utilizes in-situ solidification/stabilization techniques during the construction preparation stage, which includes the transportation of necessary equipment. It is specifically applied within a unit process aimed at treating 16 hectares of heavy metal-contaminated farmland in Nujiang, Yunnan Province, China. The primary goal is to reduce the bioavailable concentrations of Cadmium (Cd) and Lead (Pb) in the soil by more than 70%, ensuring that the concentrations of these metals in crops meet the required safety standards by 100%.
本工艺是为受铅锌矿活动污染的农田环境治理而设计的。修复过程采用原位钝化/稳定化技术，并在施工准备阶段进行，包括必要设备的运输。该过程特别适用于在中国云南省怒江州治疗16公顷重金属污染耕地的单元过程。其主要目标是使土壤中的镉（Cd）和铅（Pb）的生物有效浓度降低超过70%，确保作物中这些重金属的浓度100%达到安全标准。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 肖萌 et al. 农田污染钝化修复环境影响定量评估方法与案例分析. 中国环境科学 43, 3571–3581 (2023).
肖萌 et al. 农田污染钝化修复环境影响定量评估方法与案例分析. 中国环境科学 43, 3571–3581 (2023).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this dataset, it is important to consider the specificity of the location and the contaminants involved. The dataset is only applicable for lead and zinc mine-polluted farmland and specifically for in-situ soil stabilization construction processes. Users should not generalize the data for other types of environmental remediation or geographical locations without careful consideration and potential adjustment. Attention should be given to the baseline contamination levels and the efficacy of the method for varying concentrations of heavy metals. It is also recommended to consider the long-term effectiveness and potential environmental impacts of the solidification/stabilization process. In terms of modeling, accurate representation of the in-situ stabilization process and transport of heavy metals within the soil should be emphasized.
使用此数据集时，需要考虑地点的具体性和所涉及的污染物。该数据集只适用于铅锌矿污染的农田以及具体的原位土壤稳定化施工过程。用户在未经仔细考虑和可能调整的情况下，不应将数据概括用于其他类型的环境修复或地理位置。应注意基线污染水平和该方法对不同浓度重金属的有效性。还建议考虑钝化/稳定化过程的长期效果和可能的环境影响。在建模方面，应强调准确地表示原位稳定化过程和土壤中重金属的运输。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
